summary: This is an AT&T International Call Detail Record (ICDR) report for phone number (978)525-8484, covering the period from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020. The report was created on June 17, 2020, for Matter ID 2996479, likely as part of a law enforcement investigation, and shows numerous calls to and from the United Kingdom.

events.title: Series of calls to/from UK
events.description: Multiple short-duration calls (mostly unanswered) were made from the target US number to the United Kingdom.

events.title: Series of calls to/from UK
events.description: Another series of calls from the target US number to the United Kingdom, with some calls answered.

events.title: Calls to/from UK
events.description: Calls from the target US number to the United Kingdom, including one answered call lasting 4 minutes and 40 seconds.

events.title: Call to/from UK
events.description: A call from the target US number to the United Kingdom lasting 7 minutes and 34 seconds.

events.title: Multiple calls to/from UK
events.description: A series of calls over several days from the target US number to the United Kingdom, with varying durations including some longer answered calls.

keyFacts: The document is a telephone call detail record for phone number (978)525-8484, obtained by law enforcement (Matter ID 2996479).
The record covers a 3.5-month period from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020, and was generated on June 17, 2020.
It shows a pattern of international calls from the US number to the United Kingdom, with many short, unanswered calls and several longer, answered calls.
The document is marked as SDNY (Southern District of New York) evidence, indicating it was part of an investigation or prosecution.
The data is sourced from AT&T's International Call Detail Records (ICDR) system, which may not capture the entire call path.
